problem: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,弦CD⊥AB,垂足为点E．点G是⁀{AC}上的任意一点,延长AG交DC的延长线于点F,连接GC,GD,AD．若∠BAD=25°,则∠AGD等于()
comment: 此题考查圆周角定理,关键是利用直径得出∠ABD=65°．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, the chord CD ⊥ AB, and the vertical foot is the point E. Point G is any point on ⁀AC. Extend the extended line between AG and DC at point F and connect GC, GD, AD. If ∠BAD = N_0, then ∠AGD is equal to ()
